snippet: On Jan. 1, California will become the first state in the nation to charge industries across the economy for the greenhouse gases they emit.
abstract: California in January 2013 will embark on grand experiment in tackling climate change, becoming first state in nation to charge industries across the economy for greenhouse gases they emit; cap-and-trade system will set overall ceiling on emissions and assign allowable amounts for individual polluters; allowances will be reduced over time. (Series: So California Goes)
lead_paragraph: On Jan. 1, California will become the first state in the nation to charge industries across the economy for the greenhouse gases they emit.
